results.title: Effect of Adjunctive Simvastatin on Depressive Symptoms Among Adults With Treatment-Resistant Depression
results.text_hl: ...In this study, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ was not beneficial for the treatment of symptoms of @<m>DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder_Treatment_Resistant</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D061218 @@@treatment-resistant depression@@@ compared with standard care.

citations.NLM: Husain MI, Chaudhry IB, Khoso AB, Kiran T, Khan N, Ahmad F, Hodsoll J, Husain MO, Naqvi HA, Nizami AT, Chaudhry N, Khan HA, Minhas F, Meyer JH, Ansari MA, Mulsant BH, Husain N, Young AH. Effect of Adjunctive Simvastatin on Depressive Symptoms Among Adults With Treatment-Resistant Depression JAMA Netw Open. 2023 Feb 1;6(2):e230147. PMID: 36808239
